alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 9:33PM CDT until April 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity affecting Franklin Parish. For the Lower Ouachita...including Alto, Fort Necessity, Tendal, Newlight, Como, Clayton, Jonesville L&D, Acme...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 51.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 51.0 feet tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Boeuf River Fort Necessit 50.0 51.0 Mon 8 pm CDT 50.7 50.1 49.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning at 10 AM CDT.
